summary: ESSENCE-FL receives data from 210 of emergency departments (ED) and 33 urgent care centers (UCC) throughout the state of Florida. ESSENCE-FL receives data from 210 of emergency departments (ED) and 33 urgent care centers (UCC) throughout the state of Florida, including 12 EDs and 3 UCCs in Hillsborough County. each day this surveillance began with the review of the visits of interest email, facility and syndrome volumes, the VOI query, emerging infectious disease queries, and the review of Florida Poison Information Center data. a daily summary report of the enhanced surveillance was manually created and provided by email to public health officials. daily syndromic surveillance in Hillsborough County has been useful in detecting reportable diseases, clusters, and providing situational awareness in a timely manner.
